text:
Realm Five, Inc. | Software Engineer, Firmware Engineer | Lincoln, NE | ONSITE | FULL-TIME | https://www.realmfive.com

Realm Five is developing disruptive solutions to automate production agriculture. Our solutions utilize IoT (Internet of Things), data analysis, and automation technologies. Our stack includes Ruby, Javascript, React-Native, C/C++, Go, AWS, and LabView.

We develop the hardware, firmware and software in-house. We are hiring for a variety of positions:

    Full Stack Web Developer(Jr./Mid./Sr.)
    Mobile Application Developer (Hybrid)
    Embedded Device Firmware Engineer
Holler at justin.collier@realmfive.com if you're interested in helping us solving big problems in agriculture around the world.
